description_carte: Cancer dwells in the abyssal depths, a monstrous crab whose shell is adorned with the faces of the drowned.
description_visuelle: A giant, bioluminescent crab with a shell covered in screaming, ghostly faces. Its claws drip with corrosive seawater.

skills.name: Crushing Claw
skills.description: Cancer delivers a powerful claw strike, dealing heavy damage and applying a bleed effect.

skills.name: Corrosive Spray
skills.description: Cancer sprays a jet of corrosive seawater, dealing damage over time.

skills.name: Haunted Shell
skills.description: The faces on Cancer's shell unleash a wave of fear, reducing the target's attack.

skills.name: Abyssal Fortification
skills.description: Cancer hardens his shell, greatly increasing his defense.
